amendatorysection.catchline: Game and Parks Commission; expenses; per diem.
amendatorysection.para: The members of the Game and Parks Commission, other than the secretary, shall be reimbursed for expenses incurred in the discharge of their official duties as provided in sections 81-1174 to 81-1177 and shall be allowed a per diem of thirty-five dollars for days actually away from home on business of the commission, not exceeding forty-five days in any one year.
